class.name: Script
class.description: Base class for scripts. Any script that is loaded becomes one of these resources, which can then create instances.

method.name: can_instance
method.description: Return true if this script can be instance (ie not a library).

method.name: get_source_code
method.description: Return the script source code (if available).

method.name: has_source_code
method.description: Return true if the script contains source code.

method.name: instance_has
method.description: Return true if a given object uses an instance of this script.
